caption.p: Heterologous expression and purification of recombinant MAPK protein; (a) Visualization of recombinant MAPK protein on polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis (PAGE) gel, (b) Activity assay of purified recombinant MAPK protein under differential HS; C - 22 ± 3℃, T 1 - 32℃, 2 h, T 2 - 38℃, 2 h; denatured (DN) recombinant MAPK protein was used as negative control, vertical bars indicate s.e (n = 3).
